attributes.action: Reduce the price of LPG at the pump.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the cost of LPG is £0.51 per litre at the pump in Northern Ireland. It will soon not be economically viable to run a vehicle on LPG therefore forcing drivers to return to polluting Petrol and Diesel alternatives. 
If the Labour Government is serious about green issues then LPG should be supported as a cleaner alternative to Petrol and Diesel and the cost should reflect this support.
